articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: McCabe says his and Comey's selection for 'rigorous' IRS audits should be investigated
articles.description: Former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe on Wednesday said an investigation should be launched into how he and former FBI Director James Comey were both selected by the Internal Revenue Service for an intensive tax audit.

articles.title: Video: Mulvaney calls late days of Trump White House 'anarchy' and 'chaos' - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Trump acting Chief of Staff Mick Mulvaney discusses his reaction to Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony before the January 6 committee.

articles.title: 'His dad did everything he could to protect his son' - CNN Video
articles.description: Irina and Kevin McCarthy were both killed in the Highland Park shooting, leaving their 2-year-old son Aiden behind. A GoFundMe was created for the toddler and his caregivers.

articles.author: Shimon Prokupecz and Matthew J. Friedman, CNN
articles.title: Uvalde teacher feels forgotten by the officers sent to rescue him and his students
articles.description: Robb Elementary teacher Arnie Reyes tells CNN he could hear law enforcement outside his classroom during the mass shooting but no one came in to help.
articles.content:
Uvalde, Texas (CNN)As he lay in his own blood, with dead and dying students around him, Arnie Reyes knew help was just outside the classroom door.

articles.title: 'Hero citizen' tip thwarted a mass shooting planned for July 4 celebration in Richmond, Virginia, police say
articles.description: One phone call saved countless lives and prevented a potential mass shooting during July 4 celebrations in Richmond, Virginia, the police chief and mayor said Wednesday.
articles.content:

articles.title: 'Unphased': CNN's Josh Campbell on Highland Park gunman's demeanor in court - CNN Video
articles.description: Robert E. Crimo III, the gunman detained in the deadly shooting at a Fourth of July parade in Illinois will be held without bond, a judge in Illinois' Lake County said in a hearing Wednesday. CNN's Josh Campbell was in the courtroom and describes what he saw.

articles.author: Alisha Ebrahimji, CNN
articles.title: 2-year-old orphaned in parade shooting was shielded by his father as the wounded man lay dying
articles.description: By his father's final act of heroism, Aiden McCarthy survived Monday's carnage at a July Fourth parade in suburban Chicago. But the 2-year-old now is left to grow up without either of his parents -- an orphan of America's bane of mass shootings.

articles.title: The parents of a 2-year-old boy, two beloved grandfathers and a lifelong synagogue member are among the victims of the July Fourth parade shooting
articles.description: What was supposed to be a patriotic celebration turned into a day of tragedy and fear when a gunman killed seven people and injured dozens more at a July Fourth parade in Highland Park, Illinois.
